name: The Forest Dream
description:
This game has been made primarily for time-passing on rather than a phone but a laptop. It was made by two 13 year old children for a competition known as the "GameDesign Championship". You have been placed in a forest only to fight 4 types aliens spawning from two UFOs. It is made look like an 8 year old's dream. It is a 1st person shooter  3rd person shooter.

Please be kind enough to donate if you enjoy the game.
